H0.text: What is the name of the drunken robot in the TV series Futurama. Boltron

H1.text: What is the name of the drunken robot in the TV series Futurama. Rusty

H2.text: What is the name of the drunken robot in the TV series Futurama. Zeta

H3.text: What is the name of the drunken robot in the TV series Futurama. BENDER

A4.text: The name Bender was chosen by creator Matt Groening as an homage to John Bender (played by Judd Nelson), a character in The Breakfast Club.
